title: Dear Richard Madeley: 'I’m struggling to accept my father’s new family'
text:
Dear Richard

When I was just 10 years old, my father had an affair and left the family home. I am now 18. We always remained very close even when, not long after he left, I learnt that he and the lady were expecting a child together. I found this difficult to process and remained very repressed throughout the pregnancy.

Now my younger sister is five. I visit every Sunday, but I feel uninvolved. I speak to my father about this, but he insists that it is me who is building a wall and not them excluding me. However, my father seems completely devoted to his new family – he’s practically raised the lady’s son from a previous relationship. This lady is quite controlling and dislikes me spending time...
